entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use live apphost build in crossgen2 #66866
  • Installers are a complete mess #66864
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Http is too heavy-weight for mobile usages #66863
  • Remove redist entries from PlatformManifestFileEntry #66860
  • NativeAOT Linux source build doesn't work with linking targets #66859
    7.0.0
  • In-proc event listener listening to native runtime event source events crashes on Mono Linux #66854
  • Threadpool test CooperativeBlockingCanCreateThreadsFaster failing on Mac #66852
  • System.Text.Json SourceGenerator crashes if #66851
  • .NET 7.0 Preview 2 Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #66848
    7.0.0
  • .NET 5 VB Late bound variables unavailable at run time due to Public member 'Visible' on type 'Application' not found #66847
  • Regex engines only look for 'LF' line endings when using RegexOptions.Multiline mode as opposed to looking for 'CRLF' as well #66845
    7.0.0
  • RegexGenerator fails for interfaces with in/out type parameters #66842
  • [API Proposal]: System.Buffers.Text.Base64Url #66841
  • System.IO.Tests.BinaryWriterExtendedTests.WriteAsciiString regressed on 32 bit platforms #66840
  • float parsing benchmarks have regressed on 32 bit platforms #66838
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.Perf_AsyncMethods.Yield regressed on ARM64 #66837
    7.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_VectorConvert.Convert_ulong_double has regressed a lot on x86 #66832
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests out of memory #66831
  • Password character display on console with Console.ReadKey(true) #66829
  • Higher CPU usage since update from 5.0.13 to 6.0.1+ #66827
    7.0.0
  • Evaluation of list + string. #66824
  • Add properties for arrays, strings and other System classes #66823
  • System.Data.Odbc cannot find odbc32.dll in dotnet/aspnet:6 #66822
  • Possible Assert when disposing SslStream during transfer/handshake #66818
  • AddSeconds and FromSeconds rounding issues #66815
    Future
  • NativeAOT: write dgml regardless the failure of compilation #66813
    Future
  • NativeAOT: Type.BaseType throws exeption when there is no basetype in reflection-free-mode #66810
    Future
  • area-Extensions-DependencyInjection：Problems encountered using DependencyInjection #66809
  • JsonObject Unable to find a default constructor to use for type #66808
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.DynamicRevocationTests.RevokeEndEntity_PolicyErrors_NotTimeValid(policyErrors: True, notTimeValid: True) #66803

Closed

  • Analyzer for `System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute` #63714
    7.0.0
  • NullabilityInfo returns incorrect state for non nullable reference type in nested generics #66708
  • testing labeler System.Text.Json #66858
  • Document DllImport probing #4596
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Can System.Net.Http.Json inject a serializer to let the user decide which serializer to use #66835
  • .NET 7.0 Preview 1 Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #65200
    7.0.0
  • HtmlEncoder manual configuration does not work for some symbols. #66728
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests.Perf_Rfc2898DeriveBytes.DeriveBytes regressed on Unix-like OSes #66830
  • Should support Ber encoded timestamp #66834
  • IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract gets permissions error when run under C:\Program Files\ #66796
  • EventSource source generator should mark both source and IL as autogenerated #64563
    7.0.0
  • [Android][x86] Build failed: Opcode r4_add/r4_conv_to_r8 missing from machine description file. #65958
  • SslStream tests can hit Assert and fail completely #65455
    7.0.0
  • Unexpected Linq (Except Method) Behaviour #66760
  • NativeAOT - Exited with code 137 on Linux #66807
  • NativeAOT requirements on Linux #66806
  • [FAIL] System.Threading.Tests.PeriodicTimerTests.PeriodicTimer_ActiveOperations_TimerRooted #66798

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Arm64 PGO Builds #66867
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove `IsEmpty` workaround in `Span` and `ReadOnlySpan` #66865
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Debug` #66862
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Update coredistools from 1.0.1-prerelease-00006 to 1.1.0 #66861
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix Character Spelling in ContentType #66857
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Don't apply IMAGE_REL_BASED_REL32 when address doesn't belong to current section #66855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure that fgMorphFieldToSimdGetElement doesn't call gtNewSimdGetElementNode if the ISA is unsupported #66853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add tests for RegexGenerator on interface and virtual members #66850
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Cleanup macos 32 bit #66849
    os-mac-os-x, area-PAL-coreclr
  • [mono] Remove w32error code #66846
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix heap walking with global allocation context #66844
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update Podcast app repo #66843
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Avoid boxing array enumerator in StackTrace.TryResolveStateMachineMethod #66836
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • Disabled System.Security.Cryptography.Tests for Android x64 and x86 #66833
    area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0] Fix unaligned UTF16 string read in collect tracing EventPipe command. #66828
    Servicing-consider, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Avoid IntPtr[] allocation in Associates.AssignAssociates #66825
    area-System.Reflection
  • Refactor suggested in 65842 #66821
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Delete System.Runtime.Experimental leftovers #66819
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix crossgen2 RID in linux-musl cross build #66814
    area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • [mono] Make the --llvmonly mode the same as --llvmonly-interp. #66811
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Do not include redist files in runtime packs #66805
    area-Infrastructure
  • [IGNORE][wasm] trying perf pipeline on windows #66804
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Make the `EventSource` generator incremental et.al. #64579
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Replace AsArgument/AsParameter with less P/Invoke-centric concepts #66784
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Remove a few set but unused variables #66839
  • Dedup patterm/options/timeout in Regex source generator #66747
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Reduce string allocations in XmlWriterTraceListener #66762
    area-System.Xml
  • [mono] Remove unused MONO_DEBUG=dont-free-domains option. #66817
  • [mono] Move basic w32file* and w32process* functions to eventpipe #66731
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging` #65262
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Pass generic context when ldftn of generic method #66350
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Hot Reload: support for reloadable types #66749
    area-EnC-mono
  • Use guint64 in UCONTEXT_REG_SET_PC (arm64) #66812
    community-contribution
  • Remove superfluous string[] and string from System.IO.Packaging.ContentType #66764
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Disable Windows arm32 pinvoke stress tests #66790
    disabled-test
  • Reenable 4611 and 4703 #66792
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Load C++/CLI DLLs built against .NET 7.0+ in default ALC #66486
    area-Host

Updated

  • Add metrics for caching #66479
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add SubstitutionParser that uses XPath Navigator into NativeAOT #64671
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add vectorized paths for Span<T>.Reverse #64412
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Enable ASAN for CoreCLR #54580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Move libunwind directories to src/native/external #64043
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Fix a few local store warnings #66766
  • Introduce write barriers in wasm bindings, migrate to ref/out params, add gc safe regions #65994
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventSource` #66802
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Change ConfigurationBinder to avoid reading properties unnecessarily. #66723
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • perf: Pass --dotnet-path to use dotnet-workload for wasm #66795
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use shared SocketAddress code in QUIC #66794
    area-System.Net
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Improve `CreateDirectory` on Windows #66754
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Try to fix a time-sensitive thread pool test #66765
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Add the CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute type to make it easier to identify marshaller types #65591
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Emscripten 3.1.1 bump #63894
    area-Build-mono
  • Avoid allocating a delegate in OptionsMonitor.Get() when possible. #66688
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Only use first field maps for shared statics #66558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove condition that forbids promotion of HFAs with CUSTOMLAYOUT flag #64863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use no-recent-activity in inactive Draft PRs #66771
  • JIT: handle large OSR funclet frame initial SP delta for arm64 type 5… #66124
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add xarch `blsmsk` #66561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix static virtual calls to generic methods from gshared code #66739
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Adds Range Manipulation APIs for Collection<T> and ObservableCollection<T> #65101
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Methods on primitives 65707 #66654
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, needs-author-action
  • Identify OSArchitecture at run-time #60910
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #66783
    community-contribution
  • Track all HttpConnectionPoolManager instances in a global list #66801
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build for musl 1.1.24 #24448
  • Workload not found: android-aot installing macos workload #24441

PullRequests

Created

  • Hide manifest updates during workload install #24451

    Area-Workloads
  • Fix help infinite loop. #24449

  • Renable the test based on feedback. #24447
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #24446

  • Adding Package Validation support for cases where PackageId is different than AssemblyName #24439

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24416

  • Properly handle empty solution and project paths in SDK resolver #24333

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1670744 #24395
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Port the prep machine change and the helix update to VS 2022 #24412
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • No way to navigate to user defined operator #60264
  • Attribute to disallow usage of positional parameters (avoid breaking change in source generated code) #60263
  • .editorconfig UI editor in VS2022 insert duplicate lines for same rule when saved. #60262
  • Intermittent build failures with "error CS0104: `X` is an ambiguous reference between `System.X` and `System.X`" #60259
  • Regex Generators fail to build with WPF #60257
  • [Questions] Several questions about source generators #60256
  • [MetadataAsSource] Decompilation can end up showing the wrong source language #60253
    17.2
  • Smart break line does not work with checked / unchecked blocks #60250
  • Unnecessary cast diagnostic sometimes missing in top level programs #60248

Closed

  • .editorconfig File Editor Has Issue if No .cs Files Exist #58610
    17.2
  • "Insert space between method name and its opening parenthesis" apper twice in the new editorConfig UI #56482
    17.2
  • EditorConfig UI: Seemingly Duplicate entries #53789
    17.2
  • .editorconfig regressions in Visual Studio v16.10 #54526
    17.2
  • Error 0x80041FEB or text mode when auto-opening editorconfig created with Add > New EditorConfig #59114
    17.2
  • GUI Editor for editorconfig files doesn't work. #58614
    17.2
  • Unable to open .editorconfig files #59113
    17.2
  • VsCrash when trying to create . EditorConfig #59112
    17.2
  • EditorConfig UI: Location column doesn't refresh #59099
    17.2
  • Wrong defaults for code analysis rules #59371
    17.2
  • VS 20221 .editorConfig not detecting custom settings #57812
    17.2
  • VS 2022 : saving 'Code Style' option is not correct #58608
    17.2
  • C# Code Style Options (general) are not correctly saved #58609
    17.2
  • CSharp.Emit.UnitTests are flaky #42590
    17.2
  • View.Modified desynch editing .editorconfig #58607
    17.2
  • EditorConfig setting for csharp_new_line_before_open_brace is not saved correctly in Visual Studio #57937
    17.2
  • EditorConfig makes changes to my .editorconfig when switching the Code Style tab #57743
    17.2
  • Adding editorconfig then re-opening results in massively edited editorconfig #58616
    17.2
  • The status of the editorconfig file is unedited after modifying the .editorconfig file #60233
    17.2
  • EditorConfig UI enhancements #53171
    17.2
  • F7 (switch to text-view) not working in .editor Config Editor in VIsual Studio 2022 #58605
    17.2
  • Add option to disable graphical .editorconfig UI #54925
    17.2
  • Unable to open/restore New EditorConfig UI Editor after setting Source Code (Text) Editor as default editor #55177
    17.2
  • No obvious way to "View Code" of an .editorconfig after the designer was added #60236
    17.2
  • Options|Text Editor|C#|Code Style|Formatting|Spacing – some of shows do not work #54532
    17.2
  • Building 5.0 projects with 6.0-preview SDK results in warnings when EnforceCodeStyleInBuild=true #54867
    17.2
  • LSIF tool has uncaught exception when Uri is relative path #59692
    17.2
  • Analyzer to flag a non-public class if it is not marked as sealed #23426
    Backlog
  • The IDE interferes with typing a new raw string literal #59593
    17.3
  • License mismatch in VbMyTemplateText.vb and project root #50604

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement QuickInfo for UTF8 String Literals #60268
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Implement source generator timing APIs #60267
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Move CSharpDiagnosticAnalyzerQuickInfoProvider to EditorFeature #60266
    Area-IDE
  • Implement classification for UTF8 String Literals #60265
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60261
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Edit the breaking change doc for publishing on docs #60260
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Add F1HelpTests for `checked` keyword. #60258
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Only report missing disposal interfaces if used #60252
    Area-Compilers
  • Correct change ObjectCreationExpression to ImplictObjectCreationExpression for SmartBreakline #60249
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60247
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Revert "Initialize default capabilities before switching to the UI th… #60240
    Next
  • Fix handling for source generated documents in LSIF #59891
    Area-IDE, Next
  • A few improvements to common lightbulb cases. #60251
    Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60254
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0 #59429
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Try to provide fine-grained text changes in await-completion to help out other hosts. #60197
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60246
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update file license header from Apache2 to MIT #50618
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • AbstractFlowPass.VisitStackAllocArrayCreation should use the regular way for visiting initializer #60210
    Area-Compilers
  • Always try to use cached data for import completion even if outdated #59760
    Area-IDE
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix type parameter scoping for local functions #60098
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't complete quotes if they complete a valid string #60227
    Area-IDE
  • Fix conversion issues in null coalescing operator #60202
    Area-Compilers
  • Add IMethodSymbol.IsIterator and forward to symbol IsIterator #60244
    Area-Compilers
  • Stabilize ErrorsAfterClosingFile test #60228
    Area-IDE
  • Remove Name property, make NotificationOption immutable #60245
    Area-IDE
  • Suppress nullable property/field initialization warning for required members #60243
  • Initial sketch of exposing imports from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers, api-ready-for-review
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • Add FixAll in containing type/member support for code fixes #59989
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Move more package initialization to BG. #60211
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Fix speculative semantic model scenarios #59767
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Don't offer convert to switch when an implicit cast is present #60224
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #60188
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected use of an aliased name #40782
  • Installers are a complete mess #40781
  • `DataAnnotationsValidator` validates unexpectedly when a custom child component changes state #40780
  • [Dependency] Bump version support for Swashbuckle in templates #40778
  • Exception thrown in RequestDelegateFactory.Create when handling null as a default value for nullable struct type #40774
  • Blazor <InputFile> component throws Uncaught (in promise) Error #40772
  • default logging to console has bad perf on windows, should be disabled by default #40770
  • @Blackleones #40767
  • FromBody wouldnt honor System.Text.Json.JsonPropertyName for deserializing #40766

Closed

  • Authorize attribute does not work #40632
  • Blazor WASM site not working on iOS 15.4 / iPhone 13 #40749
  • Automated InvokeVoidAsync on loaded Blazor component to refresh javascript init #40743
  • Add maxLength in PasswordOptions #37866
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Swashbuckle to latest stable for templates #40779
    area-infrastructure
  • Enable more MSVC warnings for SDL signoff #40777
    area-runtime
  • Use navigator.userAgentData in Javascript Mono Debugger #40773
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Change .js MIME type to text/javascript #40771
    area-runtime
  • Enable a few whitespace enforcing IDE rules #40769
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • Correct `--architecture` in `fpm` commands #40768
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Added onmouseleave and onmouseenter events. #40519
    area-blazor, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Make IResults types public #40704
    area-web-frameworks
  • WPF/WinForms Blazor WebView Exception Handling #40765
    area-blazor, 6.0.x
  • Cleanup logs after successful test runs #40411
    area-infrastructure
  • Get richnav.yml building again #40729
    area-infrastructure
  • Include arm64 payloads for hosting bundle #40709
    area-infrastructure
  • Consume HostApplicationBuilder from WebApplicationBuilder #40459
    area-runtime
  • Trim Http.Extensions #40561
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Adding a new ActionResult to process IResult #40710
    area-mvc
  • Support falling back to ConnectionId when RawConnectionId is 0 on HTTP.sys #40760
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Add gRPC JSON transcoding #40242
    area-grpc

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XamlC should compile RowDefinition and ColumnDefinition CollectionTypeConverters #5430
  • DisplayAlert only fires once on TapGesture in ShellItem Page #5425
  • LocalApplicationData path does not get created #5423
  • Set Page-Title in OnAppearing with async call #5419
  • Flyout menu is always accessible irrespective of the Shell settings in the Windows platform #5414
  • Entrybox as Password=True writes wrong way #5412
  • Undefined symbols for architecture arm64 when switching from preview13 to preview14 #5411

Closed

  • Preview 14: Dependency Injection not working anymore #5398
  • `ConfigureEssentials` called `AppActions.SetAsync` even if the app doesn't use App Actions feature #5388
  • NavigationPage.ToolbarItems not shown on Android and Windows #5031
  • MAUI Blazor Win App Crashes when installed #5417
  • CollectionView with header template throw exception on android. #5415
  • Creating first maui app floods the error list, only to remove most of them later #3922
  • Update Contributing.md #5099
  • Add new VisualDiagnostic APIs for rendering elements and views as images. #5340

PullRequests

Created

  • [workload] move @(KnownFrameworkReference) to WorkloadManifest.targets #5429
  • Reject IPC calls from differing origin in Blazor WebView #5428
  • [Blazor] Fixes Win UI deployed apps this time for good #5426
  • [android] port bottomtablayout.axml to Java #5424
  • [Anndroid] Fix crash using Shadows with CollectionView items #5416
    platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, fatal
  • Conform the Essentials API to the rest of MAUI #5407
    area/essentials 🍞

Merged

  • Trimming Clean up #5028
    area/app-size 🤏
  • [testing ] Fix demands device tests for Monterey #5427
  • Don't call AppActions.SetAsync if no AppActions have been registered. #5403
  • Update WASDK & Cleanup Single Project .props #5333
  • Fixed bug in NavigationPage ToolbarItems were not visible #5397
  • Add additional VisualDiagnostic Image APIs #5360

Updated

  • Improved non-HTTP(S) link handling behavior #5313
  • [LOC_HB] checkin of localized string files #5352
  • Fix 'Properties' folder visibility in the .NET MAUI Blazor template #5405
  • [MacCatalyst] Fix usage of pickers on the Mac #5404
    area/desktop 🖥️, control-picker
  • Add first iteration of default style theme #5111
    do-not-merge
  • Mark renderers and related base classes as obsolete #5322
  • BackButtonBehavior WinUI Fixes #5391
    area/shell 🐢
  • [GH-4958] Platform behavior implementation #5043
  • Mark all the Device [Obsolete] #5088
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Remove SetupDefaults #5317
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fixed rename of SetOnAppTheme -> SetAppTheme #5390
  • Clean up flow direction tests for Layouts on Windows #5406
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Entity framework produces libSystem.native error #27669
  • Relational-specific methods can only be used when the context is using a relational database provider. #27667
  • An exception "SqlException: Cannot open database "aspnet-xxxx" requested by the login." thrown when register a new user for the 7.0 web InAuth project. #27666

Closed

  • Refactor ReaderModificationCommandBatch #27583
    7.0.0
  • SQL Server: reduce default minimum batch size to 1 #27477
    7.0.0
  • Use RETURNING/OUTPUT clause for UPDATE/DELETE #27547
    7.0.0
  • [CompiledQuery] Expression of type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.Internal.SingleQueryingEnumerable cannot be used for return type 'System.Linq.IQueryable #27657
  • IReadOnlyCollection<string> throws an exception with CosmosDB #27643

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify logging by collapsing together sync/async #27668

Merged

  • Refactor ReaderModificationCommandBatch #27584
    auto-merge
  • Revert "feat (codespaces) - Add initial support for codespaces (#27483)" #27655
  • Use RETURNING/OUTPUT clause for UPDATE/DELETE #27663

Updated

  • Update to .NET SDK 7.0 Preview 2 #27447
    auto-merge
